title: Our Story
subtitle: Over 60 years of academic excellence and contribution to Madagascar's scientific development

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.firstMission: To train high-level scientists capable of contributing to the sustainable development of Madagascar and the Indian Ocean region through academic excellence and innovative research.
mission.secondMission: We are committed to providing internationally quality scientific education while preserving our cultural values and addressing local challenges.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.firstVision: To become an internationally recognized center of excellence for higher education and scientific research, while being a key player in Madagascar's socio-economic development.
vision.secondVision: We aspire to be a reference in training committed and innovative scientists capable of meeting the challenges of the 21st century.

award.title: Excellence
award.infos: We strive for excellence in all our teaching and research programs.

users.title: Collaboration
users.infos: We foster collaboration among students, teachers and international partners.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.infos: We encourage innovation and creativity in scientific research.

foundation.title: Foundation of the Faculty
foundation.description: Establishment of the Faculty of Sciences as a cornerstone of higher scientific education in Madagascar.

departments.title: Structuring of Departments
departments.description: Organization of programs in Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics, and Computer Science.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Development
infrastructure.description: Creation and modernization of laboratories and libraries to support teaching and research.

international.title: International Outreach
international.description: Establishment of collaborations with foreign universities and hosting of student exchange programs.

innovation.title: Educational Innovation
innovation.description: Introduction of digital training, online learning platforms, and modern academic projects.
